title: Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12", Locking Metal Food Tongs Non-Slip Grip
descriptions:
- - -

**Product Listing:**

Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12"

The Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set is a must-have for any kitchen. Made from high-quality stainless steel, these tongs are built to last. With their sturdy construction, they can handle any cooking task with ease. The tongs are also heat-resistant, ensuring that you can safely handle hot foods without worrying about burns.

The set includes a 9-inch cooking tong and a 12-inch BBQ grill tong, providing you with the perfect tools for indoor and outdoor cooking. The tongs feature a convenient pull ring locking mechanism, allowing you to securely lock and unlock them as needed. This ensures that your tongs won't accidentally open or close while in use.

The tongs are designed for easy storage, with a hanging loop that allows you to hang them up when not in use. They can also be locked in a drawer, saving valuable space in your kitchen. The ergonomic handle design is cushioned with silicone, providing a comfortable grip and protecting your hands from cuts. The metal tong head is also heat-resistant, allowing you to use them on hot surfaces without worry.

These tongs are not only durable and functional, but they are also easy to maintain. They are dishwasher safe, making cleanup a breeze. Their anti-rust and anti-corrosion properties ensure that they will remain in pristine condition, looking like new for years to come.

The Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs are versatile and can be used for a wide range of applications. Whether you're flipping burgers or fish, cutting roast meat, turning BBQ items, or serving salads, these tongs are up to the task. They are perfect for both indoor kitchen tasks and outdoor grilling.

Invest in the Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set and experience the convenience and durability of these essential kitchen tools. Order yours today and take your cooking to the next level!

- - -
